scripts.rm-node-module: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf client/node_modules && rm -rf server/node_modules
scripts.install-for-dev: yarn rm-node-module && yarn install && yarn install-client
scripts.garba-cart: yarn run norma-garba && npm-run-all --parallel client server-dev
scripts.compu-cart: yarn run norma-garba && npm-run-all --parallel client server-dev
scripts.empresas-cart: yarn run norma-empresas && npm-run-all --parallel client server-dev
scripts.mv-client-garba: rm -rf server/public/garbarino && mkdir -p server/public/garbarino && cd client && mv build/* ../server/public/garbarino
scripts.mv-client-compu: rm -rf server/public/compumundo && mkdir -p server/public/compumundo && cd client && mv build/* ../server/public/compumundo
scripts.mv-client-empresas: rm -rf server/public/empresarias && mkdir -p server/public/empresarias && cd client && mv build/* ../server/public/empresarias
scripts.build-garba: yarn norma-garba && yarn build-client && yarn mv-client-garba
scripts.build-compu: yarn norma-compu && yarn build-client &&  yarn mv-client-compu
scripts.build-empresas: yarn norma-empresas && yarn build-client && yarn mv-client-empresas
scripts.react-exp: CI=false PUBLIC_URL=//dj4i04i24axgu.cloudfront.net/cart-ui/empresarias yarn build-empresas && CI=false PUBLIC_URL=//dj4i04i24axgu.cloudfront.net/cart-ui/garbarino yarn build-garba && CI=false PUBLIC_URL=//dj4i04i24axgu.cloudfront.net/cart-ui/compumundo yarn build-compu
